alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Eaton; Ionia (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 12 at 11:23PM EDT until July 13 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Michigan, including the following counties, Clinton, Eaton, Ingham and Ionia. * WHEN...Until 530 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1120 PM EDT, Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain has fallen over the last few hours. An additional 1 inch or more of rain is possible over the next 2 hours, and will likely lead to worsening flood conditions in the greater Lansing area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lansing, Charlotte, Mason, Eaton Rapids, Portland, East Lansing, Grand Ledge, Williamston, Potterville, Edgemont Park, Capital Region International Airport, DeWitt, Kalamo, Webberville, Dimondale, Sebewa, Westphalia, Vermontville, Sunfield and Dansville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
